projects.title: MEET THE SLIME MOLDS
projects.summaryItalic:
Mycophiles have the luxury of naming convention confidences— think of the fall-off-the-bone tenderness of chanterelles, the adorable syllabic chassis of enoki. Even the psilocybin club has regal gravitas: Liberty caps. Golden teachers.

Now compare that to slime mold's most popular nickname: dog vomit. Often overlooked and rejected, slime mold's poetry is that of an underdog— odd, blobby, and generally damp.
